name: runner stuff
description:
A simple open source 2D game with really bad assets

github url/download: https://github.com/TheEt1234/runnerstuff/tree/master

How to download?

Go here

Download the .pck file and the .exe (if you're on linux download .x86_64 file)

Place both of them in the same folder 

run the .exe or .x86_64 file

Report bugs in the issues tab (here)
